member.name: T:TingenLieutenant.Lieutenant
member.summary: The main class for Tingen Lieutenant.
member.remarks: This class contains general methods for Tingen Lieutenant.

member.name: M:TingenLieutenant.Lieutenant.DisplayMessage(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Displays a message to the user.
member.remarks:
If is , the message is written to the console.
If is , the message is displayed in a graphical user interface (GUI).
member.param: The message to display.
Determines if the message will be displayed on the CLI or the GUI.

member.name: T:TingenLieutenant.WebService.Deploy
member.summary: Logic for deploying the Tingen Web Service.
member.remarks:
This class is intended to deploy the development branch of the Tingen
Web Service to the server that hosts the Tingen Web Service.
You can modify the configuration file to deploy any branch to any location,
but performance and security are not guaranteed.

member.name: P:TingenLieutenant.WebService.Deploy.Source
member.summary: The location of the Tingen Web Service that will be deployed.
member.remarks:
This isn't necessarily a "path", since it can be either a directory or a URL.
If the RepositoryPath is a URL:
It must point to a ".zip" file
It must formatted correctly
If the RepositoryPath is a directory:
It can be a local directory
It can be a network share/mapped drive

member.name: P:TingenLieutenant.WebService.Deploy.SourceType
member.summary: The type of source.
member.remarks:
The source type can be either:
path - A local directory
url - A URL

member.name: P:TingenLieutenant.WebService.Deploy.StagePath
member.summary: The location where the Tingen Web Service is staged for deployment.
member.remarks:
The StagingPath:
Can be a local directory
Can be a network share/mapped drive

member.name: P:TingenLieutenant.WebService.Deploy.DeployPath
member.summary: The location where the Tingen Web Service is deployed.
member.remarks:
The DeployPath:
Can be a local directory
Can be a network share/mapped drive

member.name: M:TingenLieutenant.WebService.Deploy.DeploymentProcess(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Handles the deployment process from start to finish.
member.param: The path to the configuration file.
Determines if the message will be displayed on the CLI or the GUI.

member.name: M:TingenLieutenant.WebService.Deploy.VerifyFramework(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Verifies the deployment framework directory, and creates it if it does not exist.
member.remarks: Currently, this method only checks for the existence of the ./AppData/ directory.
member.param: Determines if the message will be displayed on the CLI or the GUI.

member.name: M:TingenLieutenant.WebService.Deploy.VerifyConfiguration(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines the status of the configuration file.
member.remarks: If the is invalid, the deployment process will not proceed.
member.param: The path to the configuration file.
Determines if the message will be displayed on the CLI or the GUI.
member.returns:
The status of the configuration file:
null-or-empty: The passed is null/empty
does-not-exist: The config file does not exist at the
exists: The config file does exist at the

member.summary: Creates a default deployment configuration file at the specified path.

Determines if the message will be displayed on the CLI or the GUI.

valid-url: The is a URL, and is formatted correctly
